Package dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.graphdb

Class EmbeddedGraphDB

java.lang.Object
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.graphdb.EmbeddedGraphDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class EmbeddedGraphDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
A useful class for creating a local (embedded) GraphDB database (no networking needed).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EmbeddedGraphDB​(java.lang.String baseDir)
    Creates a new embedded instance of GraphDB in the provided directory.

      public void createRepository​(java.lang.String repositoryId, java.lang.String repositoryLabel, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> overrides) throws org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFParseException, java.io.IOException, org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFHandlerException, org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.config.RepositoryConfigException, org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryException
      Creates a repository with the given ID, label and optional override parameters.
      Parameters:
      repositoryId - a new repository ID
      repositoryLabel - a repository label, or null if none should be set
      overrides - a map of repository creation parameters that override the defaults, or null if none should be overridden

    • openConnectionToTemporaryRepository

      public static org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryConnection openConnectionToTemporaryRepository​(java.lang.String ruleset) throws java.io.IOException, org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryException, org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFParseException, org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.config.RepositoryConfigException, org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFHandlerException
      A convenience method to create a temporary repository and open a connection to it. When the connection is closed all underlying objects (EmbeddedGraphDB and LocalRepositoryManager) will be closed as well. The temporary repository is created in a unique temporary directory that will be deleted when the program terminates.
      Parameters:
      ruleset - ruleset to use for the repository, e.g. owl-horst-optimized
      Returns:
      a RepositoryConnection to a new temporary repository
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.RepositoryException
      org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFParseException
      GraphUtilException
      org.eclipse.rdf4j.repository.config.RepositoryConfigException
      org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFHandlerException
